dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hello, dearie! Why, I don't believe I've seen you before. And with sweet cheeks like those, I'd remember.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: What can Auntie Abigail do for you?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've been asked to pick up a Caffenoid supplement.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've been asked to pick up medicine. Some kind of caffeine? Or... steroids?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Are you in charge of handing out medicine?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Nothing for now, thanks.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: And what a helpful young man you are! Nothing like a little pill to liven up the spirits.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Who's your lucky "friend," dearie?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now, dearie, who's this pickup for?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Actually, the pills are for me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It's for Nyoka.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I dunno, Auntie. You'll have to pry that secret from my sweet little cheeks.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's private.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm so sorry, but with the Iconoclasts and the marauder filth chasing away what little trade we get, I'm afraid I have to reserve my supply for Stellar Bay residents.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Our reserves have gotten so low, I've even had to start locking the supply room upstairs! Isn't it a shame what some people will do to get a little extra?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You can't trust people these days.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Oh. That's just AWFUL.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You don't give five-finger discounts, Auntie?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Except for you. I can tell - you've got one of those faces.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'd make an exception for you if I could, my little cherub. Is there... anyone else needing a special pickup from Auntie Abigail?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Nyoka.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh. Her.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's none of my business, but I have told her Dr. Williams would bump up her monthly allotment if only she'd join MSI. Contribute like the rest of us.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now I've gone and said too much. And you know me, dearie, I don't like to pry.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There must be some way I can increase Nyoka's allotment.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: When can Nyoka get her next dose?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Doesn't anyone else on Monarch have Caffenoid?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm afraid not.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Dr. Williams managed the town's allotments from his terminal upstairs. Even I can't access them.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I thought you were in charge around here, Auntie. You sure ought to be.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Where can I find this Dr. Williams?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Enough sweet talk. Get me Caffenoid, or you're gonna need a taste of your own medicine.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I guess I'll have to figure this out on my own.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, you flatter an old woman! Me, I'm just here to be a pretty face for the customers.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: And to keep an extra key to the supply room. For all the times Dr. Williams misplaced his.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Supply room?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Forgetful fellow, eh?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: The one upstairs, where we store our medicines.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Careless experimentation with medicinal substances does take its toll eventually.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: In the town graveyard, I'm afraid. Poor man was always searching for the Flower of Enlightenment. On the way, he tried some... rather daring substance combinations.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Where's the graveyard?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The Flower of Enlightenment?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: The graveyard's near the southern ruins. You're certainly welcome to pay your respects, but the bodies tend to attract beasties.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Do be careful. I'd hate for anything to happen to you, dearie.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's a Philosophist symbol of some kind, dearie, never you mind.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well, this certainly isn't worth my good health. I'll get you a dose, but I'll have you know, I'm very disappointed in you.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: There, and good riddance. That's the last help you're getting from Abigail Edwards.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Chin up, dearie.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm afraid it'll be the better part of a month. Our dear Nyoka tends to exhaust her supply rather quickly.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Believe me, there's nothing I'd love better than to help you, but there's not much I can do.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: If so, I would love to know where. SubLight's supplies don't come cheap.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Isn't it just?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Aren't you a naughty boy!

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: There are no discounts here. But Auntie knows what to do with mischievous young men like you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What?!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's change the subject. Right now.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, I'd have to talk to Mr. Nandi about you, of course.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Anyway, is there anyone else needing a pickup from Auntie Abigail?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Of course. Is there anyone else needing a pickup from Auntie Abigail?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Aren't you a saucy thing!

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: I may not be a fresh young thing any more, but with age comes experience, dearie.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Uh-huh. Why don't you show me a thing or two?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: This got weird fast.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Much as I'd love to, my rheumatism is especially fierce at the moment, and I'm all out of my medicine.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: But I'd hate to send you away empty-handed. You were here for Caffenoid, weren't you? Who's it for?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Maybe some other time, then. When Auntie's personal allotment of Stimu-Lotion is restored.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now, now, there's no keeping secrets from Auntie Abigail! I'll tease it out of you one way or another.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Also, I really do have to enter someone's name for the allotment. After all, I have to keep track of where our little pills wander off to.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I suppose that's reasonable.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Rather nosy, aren't you?

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Indeed. Now, how about you tell Auntie who this pickup's for?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Never mind.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now, now, dearie. It is my job, after all.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Bless your little heart, you must mean Caffenoid. "If it's pep you need, one pill does the deed!"

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yes, indeed. Someone's got to keep Stellar Bay's people healthy and energized!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You certainly seem excited about your job.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I guess so.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, but I am. I get to see plenty of my neighbors here, and I do dearly love a little gossip.

dialog.speaker: Abigail Edwards (Female)
dialog.utterance: You certainly seem like you could use a Pep-You-Up, dearie.
